       <h1>
        Welcome to eLicense
       </h1>
       <div class="managedContent">
        <div class="row" style="background-color:#45454c; padding:30px; margin:auto; text-align:center; font-size:1.3em; color:#fff;">
         <h2 style="color:#fff;">
          eLicense will be down for system maintenance Sunday, June 24, 2018 from 6 a.m. - noon.
         </h2>
         <div style="margin:auto; max-width:500px; text-align:left; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">
          <p>
           Buy your hunting, fishing, snowmobile and ORV licenses here on the official MI DNR eLicense site.
          </p>
          <p>
           You must create an account and login to access eLicense. After logging in you will be able to do the following:
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Purchase licenses and permits and apply for drawings (such as bear and elk)
           </li>
           <li>
            View your purchase history up to three years
           </li>
           <li>
            Reprint or save to your mobile device any valid license that is legal to be carried electronically (excludes kill tags, ORV or snowmobile)
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
         <div style="display:inline-block; margin-top:50px; margin-bottom:20px;">
          <a href="../Shared/#" onclick="window.open('https://milogin.michigan.gov/mga/sps/oauth/oauth20/authorize?response_type=token&amp;client_id=7TJg85Y9405NoW4hy0Ar&amp;redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mdnr-elicense.com%2Fwelcome%2FReturnFromMILogin.aspx','SSOWindow','resizable=yes,width=400,height=600,scrollbars' ); return false;" style="text-decoration:none" title="Login to eLicense">
           <span style="padding: 20px 10px; border: 1px solid #176790; background: #5d7f36; color: #ffffff; font-size: 1.18em; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight:bold!important; text-align: center;">
            LOGIN / GET STARTED
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row" style="padding:20px; margin:0!important; font-size: 1.1em;">
         <h2>
          Need Help?
         </h2>
         <div class="col-md-5">
          <h2>
           Contact the eLicense Help Desk
          </h2>
          <p>
           Send us an email at
           <a href="mailto:MDNR-E-License@michigan.gov ">
            MDNR-E-License@michigan.gov
           </a>
           <br/>
           or give us a call at 517-284-6057
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="col-md-7">
          <h2>
           Take a video tour of the new system
          </h2>
          <p>
           This video will walk you through how to use some of the new features.
          </p>
          <div style="position:relative;padding-bottom:56.25%;padding-top:30px;height:0;overflow:hidden;">
           <iframe allowfullscreen="" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/uVBMRXHckaU?rel=0" style="position: absolute;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 100%;" title="A tour of the new eLicense system">
           </iframe>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row" style="padding:20px; margin:0!important">
         <h2>
          Announcements
         </h2>
         <h3>
          Fall turkey applications: July 1 - Aug. 1
         </h3>
         <p>
          Find detailed information about fall turkey regulations, management units, hunting hours and more in the
          <a href="https://www.michigan.gov/documents/dnr/fall_turkey_hunting_digest_530154_7.pdf" target="_blank">
           Fall Turkey Digest
          </a>
          , and
          <a href="https://www.michigan.gov/dnr/0,4570,7-350-79119_79147_81529---,00.html" target="_blank">
           find a place to hunt
          </a>
          using our online tools.
         </p>
         <h3>
          Pure Michigan Hunt applications: now through Dec. 31
         </h3>
         <p>
          You could win a prize package valued at over $4,000, including licenses for elk, bear, spring and fall turkey, antlerless deer and first pick at a Managed Waterfowl Hunt Area. Each $5 application helps fund Michigan's wildlife habitat restoration and management. Learn more at
          <a href="https://www.michigan.gov/pmh" target="_blank">
           michigan.gov/pmh
          </a>
          .
         </p>
         <h3>
          License application reminders by text
         </h3>
         <p>
          Text "MIDNR HUNTAPP" to "64468" to start receiving hunt application reminders via text message. You’ll get a text reminder the day they go on sale, midway through the application period and on the last day they're available. You’ll also get a text when the results have been posted.
         </p>
        </div>
